title: Diamond Delight: Contemporary Diamond Haaram
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds with VS clarity and F color. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the lustre.
features: This contemporary Haaram features a graceful, streamlined design with geometric motifs. The central pendant showcases inverted teardrop shapes, each encrusted with pave-set diamonds. Graduated diamond clusters accentuate the neckline, creating a dazzling effect. The setting is designed for maximum light exposure to enhance the diamond's brilliance.
colors: Rose gold and dazzling white diamonds create a soft
occasions: and other special occasions. A versatile piece that complements both traditional Indian attire and modern outfits.
description: This Diamond Haaram offers a contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The exceptional diamond quality, combined with skilled craftsmanship and a modern design, makes it a statement piece that is both elegant and timeless. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication.
